line.comment: * Returns [TRUE] if the sector has been properly claimed, null otherwise.
* Conquer sector if there was no station, otherwise claim it.
* Player needs to be set as enemy, otherwise the Battle Groups would not recognize him as "hostile".
* Here is the A.I. WarDec, Declare War. A.I. WarDec. A.I. declares war on another A.I.
* Mordan9 - Add extra notification to tell the player that an A.I. has declared war on another A.I.

line.text: ' заявляют о своих правах на сектор '
' заявляют о своих правах на принадлежащий '

line.comment: * Add-Ons 1.3: Minimal tutorial. On insane mode, only a notification reminding the player to keep Phanon alive

sval.val: Раса %s только что объявила войну расе %s!
заявляют о своих правах на сектор
заявляют о своих правах на принадлежащий
Returns [TRUE] if the sector has been properly claimed, null otherwise.
Conquer sector if there was no station, otherwise claim it.
Player needs to be set as enemy, otherwise the Battle Groups would not recognize him as "hostile".
Here is the A.I. WarDec, Declare War. A.I. WarDec. A.I. declares war on another A.I.
Mordan9 - Add extra notification to tell the player that an A.I. has declared war on another A.I.
Add-Ons 1.3: Minimal tutorial. On insane mode, only a notification reminding the player to keep Phanon alive
